Question: During this time of dire financial straits, this person published several literary reviews in newspapers to help make ends meet.
Hints: This person was in demand as a featured speaker, performing solo humorous talks similar to what would become stand-up comedy.
This particular work was not published in this person's lifetime.
In 1872, this person published a second piece of travel literature, Roughing It, as a semi-sequel to Innocents.
